original_text: Yea, whiles I was speaking in prayer, even the man Gabriel, whom I had seen in the vision at the beginning, being caused to fly swiftly, touched me about the time of the evening oblation.
korean_text: 곧 내가 기도할 때에 이전에 환상 중에 본 그 사람 가브리엘이 빨리 날아서 저녁 제사를 드릴 때 즈음에 내게 이르더니

sentences.original_text: Yea, whiles I was speaking in prayer
whom I had seen in the vision at the beginning
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 처음에 이상 중에서 보았던 그

sentences.original_text: touched me about the time of the evening oblation
sentences.korean_translation: 저녁 제물 드리는 시간쯤에 나를 만졌더라
